channel.title: *newcape*~wave cape~
channel.description: ok this is a skillcape ive been working on for a while called the wave cape is kinda flows with u i dont know how to add it to my client so if u can do it for me i will thank you a lot but here you go i will put up the client i want it on and ya [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2efhymx.jpg[/img] dont be that meen to flam but i dont want to much like i would have it on all the time bit idk about you :| :| :| :| :|

item.title: *newcape*~wave cape~
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:19, topic:275677”]Hehe, i want to join the flame war.

Tbh, why do the majority of people in this section hate dylan?
Dylan does not think he is a god, he is a god.
I think you only hate him because he is right, people don’t like to be proven wrong, i’m fully with dylan on this one, his criticism is not harsh, he is only trying to help you, and yes, the colours are awful, he is right, you are not meant to take criticism as a bad compliment, you are meant to take it as a way of improving your model, and definitely not an excuse to start a flame war.[/quote]

Again with the genius comments CJ fully what i was gonna say

Read full topic

item.title: *newcape*~wave cape~
item.dc:creator: @mollyscape mollyscape
item.description:
@mollyscape wrote:

Wow... You recolored a skill cape, then edited its shape. Get off this section unless you are actualy going to model!

Resons I hate this model…

  • Ugly colors that don’t mix
    -Retarded idea that has 1/100’s of a chance at working
    -Just a recolor and Edit

Can you do, BETTER?

  • Mollu

But since you didnt, it would look like a screwed up cape lol.

Nice idea tho.

no affence dylan_0789 but u r the meenest person on moparscape you think ur god ur full of it

just cause some1 posts and csays dont flame, doesnt mean ppl wont. mopars full of flame. everyone here does it(even ive flamed lately). the ideas better than the model.the colors sicken me.
[/quote]
no affence dylan_0789 but u r the meenest person on moparscape you think ur god ur full of it[/quote]
i dont think im god… im trying to HELP you. if i was like “um ok hai. please the colors are not good and it looks sorta, you know, not amazing” would you have done shit? no. youd have laughed at me. im sorry that my criticism is harsh, but im harsh to try and better you’re modelling abilities.lately, this section has been full of skillcapes, and its starting to piss me off, thats why my criticism has become more harsh than before. dont take it personal. i DO NOT think im god. if you think that about me, you obviously cant understand the reason behind harsh criticism.
